working_the_layers::preview_card_2::head: Layers can be used to help the audience experience the character’s environment.
working_the_layers::clip_card_0::goals[1: Capture a character with a background that informs us about their environment.
working_the_layers::title: Working the Layers
working_the_layers::clip_card_0::goals[0: Have your subject fill 50% of the frame.
working_the_layers::text_card_1::text: Now practice shooting photos with layers.
working_the_layers::preview_card_0::head: Strong visuals create depth. Vary your placement of the character in your frame.
working_the_layers::preview_card_1::head: To use your entire frame well, look for opportunities to use the foreground, middle, and background of the frame.
working_the_layers::text_card_0::text: Create depth in your photos by working the layers. Let’s look at some examples.
